scripts.build-bulma: node-sass --output-style compressed bulma.sass dist/bulma-min.css && css-to-lit-js ./dist/bulma-min.css -ext ts
scripts.build-main: concat -o dist/main-src.css ./ext/modern-normalize.css ./ext/bootstrap-grid.min.css ./main.css && postcss dist/main-src.css > dist/main-min.css && css-to-lit-js ./dist/main-min.css -ext ts
scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && yarn build-bulma && yarn build-main && yarn build-kangxi
